Airship Controller: You see a floating piece of stone filled with a mysterious power. The green light is flashing, so there doesn't appear to be anything wrong with its function.

By manipulating this, you should be able to control the Airship. [npc_%objectId%_board|Board the Airship.] [npc_%objectId%_summon|Summon the Airship.] [npc_%objectId%_register|Register summoning license.] [talk_select|Quest]
